entry.title: $2650 // ***FLOOR TO CEILING WINDOWS****HUGE BALCONY****ROOF DECK***LAUNDRY
entry.content:
***FLOOR TO CEILING WINDOWS****HUGE BALCONY****ROOF DECK***LAUNDRY

Listing ID #: 167621
Price: $2,650

Brand New Luxurious 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Apartment in the heart of Astoria. Enjoy your own private balcony or head up stairs to the Rooftop Terrace where you have amazing views of Manhattan and Queens. Gorgeous stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher and microwave. Stunning hardwood flooring and high ceilings. Granite Kitchen and marble bath. Large Windows that bring in tons of sunlight. The amenities for this building include: Balcony, Rooftop Terrace Access, Gym, On-site Laundry room, **(Indoor Parking Space available for rent)** Located in the Heart of Astoria. 38th st and 30th ave. This is a prime location with everything you need just steps away, Just a 3 minute walk to N and W trains and 6 minutes away from midtown Manhattan. Plenty of Restaurants, Grocery Stores to choose from. Multiple gyms, lounges and coffee shops just around the corner for your convenience. FOR VIEWINGS CALL or TEXT Mashud Ahmed at 917-355-4162 OR EMAIL [email protected]

entry.title: $1900 // Astoria 38st!!
entry.content:
Beautiful brand new one bedroom apt. Washer and dryer in the building, patio all furnish for the summer BBQ !!! In the heart of A storia close 2 different Train lines ,restaurants ,bar ,shops, banks ...
Will go fast.
